name: Prezi
title: prezi.com
shortDescription: Prezi revolutionizes presentation creation with its AI-driven software, designed for various audiences including business, academic, and personal use. Users can start quickly by typing ideas, uploading documents, or importing existing presentations. Prezi's AI assists in writing, designing, and illustrating, ensuring presentations are engaging and visually appealing without relying on templates.
pros: Extensive library of images and media
cons: May require learning for new users
Potential privacy concerns for sensitive data

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Google Slides
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Free and integrates with Google Drive
